link.description: Link for the track. Usually to acquire it in some way, e.g. via free download or purchase. | TODO: multiple links?

downloadLink.description: Indicate the link leads to a free download for the track.

buyLink.description: Indicate the link leads to a purchase page for the track.

viewerState.description: Metadata about the requesting account's relationship with the subject content. Only has meaningful content for authed requests.
